meanings.definition: The application of typical elements of game playing (e.g., point scoring, competition with others) to other areas of activity to encourage engagement and motivation.
meanings.sent1: The gamification of the fitness app increased user participation.
meanings.sent2: Many educational apps use gamification to make learning fun.
meanings.sent3: The gamification of chores turned cleaning into a playful challenge.
meanings.sent4: In the office, gamification transformed mundane tasks into exciting quests.
meanings.sent5: The gamification of the training program made it unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The process of making something more like a game.
meanings.sent1: Her gamification of the study routine made it enjoyable.
meanings.sent2: The gamification of the workplace environment boosted morale.
meanings.sent3: The gamification of cooking dinner turned it into a fun game.
meanings.sent4: Gamification of the project management system added a competitive edge.
meanings.sent5: The gamification of the team meeting made it engaging and interactive.
